metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese • Optional: croutons for extra crunch Instructions: • Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly. • Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese. • Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.
i In a large skillet heat vegetable oil over medium heat i Cook cutlets until golden and crispy on both sides i Serve with lemon slices

i Ingredients : o 1 cup cornmeal o 1 cup flour o 1/4 cup sugar o 1 tablespoon baking powder o 1/2 teaspoon salt o 1 cup milk o 1/4 cup vegetable oil o 1 egg i Instructions : o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). o Mix cornmeal flour sugar baking powder and salt in a bowl o Serve warm
i Marinate chicken thighs in the mixture for at least 30 minutes i Cook chicken thighs until browned and cooked through i Serve chicken over cooked rice garnished with sliced green onions

i Ingredients : o 4 cups chicken broth o 1/2 cup sliced mushrooms o 1/4 cup bamboo shoots o 1/4 cup tofu o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 2 tablespoons rice vinegar o 1 tablespoon cornstarch o 1 teaspoon chili paste o 1 egg o 1/4 cup chopped green onions i Instructions : o Bring chicken broth to a boil o Mix cornstarch with water and add to the soup stirring until thickened o Garnish with chopped green onions and serve
